alert.note: Alert for Dorchester (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dorchester County through 730 PM EDT... At 700 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near University Of Maryland Center For Environmental Studies, or near Cambridge, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. Frequent cloud to ground lightning strikes. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cambridge and University Of Maryland Center For Environmental Studies around 730 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Madison, Church Creek, Woolford, Hudson and Lloyds. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
